斬.definition: to behead (as form of capital punishment); to chop

斬新.definition: variant of 嶄新|崭新[zhan3 xin1]

斬斷.definition: to cut off; to chop sth in half

斬獲.definition: to kill or capture (in battle); (fig.) (sports) to score (a goal); to win (a medal); (fig.) to reap rewards; to achieve gains

斬而不奏.definition: to do sth and not report the fact (idiom)

斬草除根.definition: to cut weeds and eliminate the roots (idiom); to destroy root and branch; to eliminate completely

斬釘截鐵.definition: lit. to chop the nail and slice the iron (idiom); fig. resolute and decisive; unhesitating; categorical
